ValidationRule.description: Phone Numbers should at least contain 8 Digits excluding the Country Code, when provided.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK(IPS_Partticipant_phone_number__c), AND( LEFT(IPS_Partticipant_phone_number__c, 1) == "+", LEN(IPS_Partticipant_phone_number__c) >= 11 ), AND( LEFT(IPS_Partticipant_phone_number__c, 1) != "+", LEN(IPS_Partticipant_phone_number__c) >= 8 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone Numbers should include at least 8 numbers including the country code
